p: In nature, we almost exclusively find mixtures of substances, not individual compounds and interactions emerging from mixtures can enhance the effects of individual components or even give rise to new effects. In the case of hop plants, it was shown that a mixture of hop proanthocyanidins is indeed more antioxidative than individual flavanols and proanthocyanidins [ 8]. Logically, a mixture of a variety of hop flavanols can also provide a protection from a broader spectrum of microorganisms than only a single compound is capable of.
